channel.title: Any one mind explaining (your dealing with a noob :/ )
channel.description:
I'm trying to get into php and using phpmyadmin. I have xampp set up correctly yada yada yada, But Im lost when it comes to making databases and tables. I know how to make them. but I dont understand how phpmyadmin corresponds wit hthe website. Does anyone have a register/database/login.php on hand also? lol
I guess what im asking is, how does everything tie in together?

item.title: Any one mind explaining (your dealing with a noob :/ )
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Try not to also post 2 topics with the same questions mate, just for future reference.

Read full topic

item.title: Any one mind explaining (your dealing with a noob :/ )
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

What exactly is your question?

Phpmyadmin is a management tool that connects to mySQL, to edit/create tables. There are other ways to do it, but phpma is one of the more common ways. For example, you could create a java program that does the same things as phpmyadmin.

Read full topic
item.source: Any one mind explaining (your dealing with a noob :/ )
